import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './index.scss' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetter' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import backendImg from '../../assets/images/backend.png'; import java from '../../assets/images/java.svg'; import html from '../../assets/images/html.svg'; import javascript from '../../assets/images/javascript.svg'; import react from '../../assets/images/react.svg'; import pyImage from '../../assets/images/pyImage.png'; const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const about_arr=['A', 'b', 'o','u','t',' ','m','e']; useEffect (() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>

I'm very ambitious fullstack developer looking for a role in established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.

I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

If I need to define myself in one sentence that would be a family person, Son of a beautiful parents, a sports fanatic, photography enthusiast, and tech-obsessed!!!
